title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "Philip Johnson, Makers of Contemporary Architecture" by John M. Jacobus and George Braziller", 1962
medium: Lithography in green and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover across the top in black and green ink: BY JOHN M. JACOBUS, SR. [black] Philip Johnson [green]/ MAKERS OF CONTEMPORARY ARCHITECURE
Down the center as spine vertically in green and black ink: Phillip Johnson [green] BY JOHN M. JACOBUS, SR. George Braziller [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Both covers have a series of vertical lines and dashes and a single line in black. There are four rows of dashes. The authors and title are written at the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for "Philip Johnson, Makers of Contemporary Architecture" by John M. Jacobus and George Braziller", 1962.
1962. Lithography in green and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-50.
